channel.title: Delete on SoftLayer API

item.title: Cancel virtual server
item.description: Operation: DELETE URL: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest/{server_id} Example CURL: $ curl --user userid:api_key curl -X DELETE https://api.softlayer.com/rest/v3/SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest/123456 Example Response:
